Articles.Content:
Hey guys. My name is KaBob799 and I've been doing KSP Let's Play videos for 5 months now and I figured it's time I post about it here.

My channel can be found at https://youtube.com/user/KaBob799 or you can skip straight to the current KSP playlist

.

You can also find Season 1 of my Let's Play

, it's 60 episodes long. Personally I suggest skipping some of the early videos because I was just learning how to do Let's Plays when the series began. I'm not a pro at KSP so you'll see a lot of failure but I managed to land on Mun, Minmus, Duna, Eve, Ike and Gilly throughout Season 1.

Most of my videos are career mode videos but I have also started doing a few funny short videos inspired by Danny2462. Here they are:

Edited July 23, 2014 by KaBob

In celebration of 0.24 coming out I have decided to end my current KSP save and start a season 2 of the lets play. I edited together this story/montage video as a season finale:

It's a bit long because I included at least a few seconds of footage from each of the 59 previous episodes. Edited July 24, 2014 by KaBob

Good news, season 2 of my Let's Play has started =D I've learned a lot since I first started LPing last year and I expect this season to get much further than the previous one. I went ahead and made a

for the new season and I've updated the first post. The series will continue to be ~30 minute episodes releasing on Wednesdays and Sundays.

This time around I'll be doing a bit more editing than I did before. Plus I'm hoping to get a new computer within a few months so my videos will hopefully make the jump to 1080p soon.
